definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: Empress Dowager of the palace and gardens from the withers not a dewy rose.
sentences.chinese: 皇太后的花園及行宮是從不曾凋謝的一支帶露玫瑰。

sentences.english: I saw your face in a crowded p(a)lace.
sentences.chinese: 我見到你容顏，在擁擠的行宮裏。

sentences.english: And now I am on my way to the palace ofthe chieftain of the Tujia nationality, which is particularly famous in Furong Town.
sentences.chinese: 我現在要去的就是當地芙蓉鎮特別有名的土王行宮。

sentences.english: The south side is the main hall, the main building for days after the palace.
sentences.chinese: 山門南面是大殿，爲天后行宮的主體建築。

sentences.english: Beijing was the winter capital for what well-known ruler?
sentences.chinese: 北京曾是哪位著名統治者的冬季行宮所在地？

sentences.english: And he made darkness pavilions round about him, dark waters, and thick clouds of the skies.
sentences.chinese: 他以黑暗和聚集的水，天空的厚云爲他四圍的行宮。

definition: Shanhai Pass in Hebei, at the eastern terminus of the Ming dynasty Great Wall/Shanhaiguan district of Qinhuangdao city 秦皇島市|秦皇岛市[Qin2 huang2 dao3 shi4], Hebei
Eastern tombs/Dongling district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning
Juyongguan, frontier fortress on Great Wall north of Beijing, in Changping district 昌平區|昌平区[Chang1 ping2 qu1]
Jiayu Pass in Gansu, at the western terminus of the Great Wall/Jiayuguan prefecture-level city in Gansu
Yuanmingyuan, the Old Summer Palace, destroyed by the British and French army in 1860
Longevity Hill in the Summer Palace 頤和園|颐和园[Yi2 he2 yuan2], Beijing
